title: Frontend Web Developer - Sebastian Londoño
description: Frontend Web Developer from Medellín, Colombia. Specialist in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ES6+, React, Node.js, Flutter, and web performance optimization.

hero.title: Hello, I'm Sebastian Londoño!
hero.description: Specialist in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ES6+, React, Node.js, Flutter, and web performance optimization.

jobs_description.title: Software Developer - React and Flutter
jobs_description.description: I develop web and mobile applications using React and Flutter, ensuring an attractive interface and smooth user experience. I work on the design and optimization of applications, from the frontend to integration with backend services.
list: Frontend development in React and Flutter
Implementation of RESTful APIs and GraphQL
Design and development of responsive and accessible interfaces

jobs_description.title: Frontend Web Developer
jobs_description.description: I created web applications and optimized performance. I developed modern interfaces with React and ensured correct interaction with the backend, applying best design practices and optimization for fast loading of sites.
list: Web app development and maintenance with React
Optimization of web speed and accessibility
Improvement of user experience (UX) and user interface (UI)
Collaboration with design and backend teams

jobs_description.title: Freelance
jobs_description.description: Freelance work on web projects, where I offer my skills in frontend development, interface design, and website optimization to provide the best user experience.
list: Consulting on best development practices and user experience optimization

projects.title: Go Shoppe
projects.description: Go Shoppe is a sales system designed to facilitate inventory, customer, and sales management. With its simple and accessible interface, it allows users to create invoices, generate reports, and maintain control over their business efficiently.

projects.title: WellHound
projects.description: WellHound is an innovative mobile app for identifying and reporting orphaned oil and gas wells. The app allows users to easily report abandoned wells, receive real-time updates, and track their reports' progress. With a focus on ease of use, WellHound facilitates active community participation to improve safety and monitoring of these wells.

projects.title: Sniffle VideoCall
projects.description: Sniffle is a video call app that uses AgoraIO to provide clear and high-quality communication. Ideal for meetings or personal interactions via video, with a simple and fast interface.

projects.title: Storage Manager App
projects.description: Storage Manager is an advanced file storage management app that uses Azure AI services to facilitate the handling and organization of large data volumes. Users can upload, store, and manage files securely and efficiently, with access from any device. Azure cloud integration ensures scalable and secure performance.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: Weather App is a tool that provides real-time weather forecasts. With a clean interface, users can check the current weather and future forecasts to stay prepared for any weather changes.

contributions.title: Epic Games
contributions.description: Replica of the Epic Games interface, designed to offer a user experience similar to the original platform. This project stands out for its visual design and functionality, using modern web technologies.

contributions.title: Remember Me
contributions.description: Remember Me is a digital platform that allows you to store and relive special memories. Its intuitive design enables users to organize photos, videos, and notes, keeping nostalgia just a click away.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Transforming ideas into fast and attractive digital experiences.
about.description: I am a Frontend Web Developer with over 1 year of experience, specializing in React, Flutter, and web optimization. My focus is on creating modern interfaces, optimizing performance, and ensuring a smooth user experience. My passion for speed and efficiency drives me to constantly seek new ways to improve the web experience.

contact.title: Ready to bring your ideas to life?
contact.subtitle: I can drive your project or be part of your team
